data.text: Na Naamani Sofar buae se,
Me tirim mu ntew me, na ɛhyɛ me sɛ mimmua
Mate animka bi a egu me ho fi,
“Ampa ara wunim sɛnea nneɛma te fi tete,
sɛ amumɔyɛfo ani gye bere tiaa bi mu,
Ɛwɔ mu sɛ nʼahohoahoa kodu ɔsoro,
ɔbɛyera afebɔɔ te sɛ nʼankasa nʼagyanan;
Otu kɔ te sɛ ɔdae, na wɔrenhu no bio,
Ani a ehuu no no renhu no bio;
Ne mma bɛpata ahiafo;
Ne mmerantebere mu ahoɔden a ahyɛ ne nnompe ma no
“Ɛwɔ mu sɛ bɔne yɛ nʼanom dɛ
ɛwɔ mu sɛ ontumi nnyaa mu
nanso, nʼaduan bɛyɛ nwen wɔ ne yafunu mu;
Ɔbɛfe ahonyade a ɔmenee no;
Ɔbɛfefe awɔ bɔre;
Ɔrennya nsuwansuwa no nnom
Ɔbɛdan nea ɔbrɛ nyae no aba a ɔrenni bi;
Efisɛ ɔhyɛɛ ahiafo so ma wodii ohia buruburoo;
“Ampa ara ɔrennya ahomegye mfi nea wapere anya no mu;
Wafom nneɛma nyinaa awie;
Nʼadedodow nyinaa mu no, ɔbɛkɔ ɔhaw mu;
Bere a nʼafuru ayɛ ma no,
Ɛwɔ mu sɛ oguan fi dade akode ano
Ɔtwe bɛmma no fi nʼakyi,
sum kabii retwɛn nʼademude.
Ɔsoro bɛda nʼafɔdi adi,
Nsuyiri bɛtwe ne fi akɔ,
Eyi ne nkrabea a Onyankopɔn de ma amumɔyɛfo,
